# Types

## Color {#zero_Color}

```C
typedef struct Color {
    uint8_t r;
    uint8_t g;
    uint8_t b;
} Color
```

A standard 8-bit RGB color representation.

# Normal functions

## color {#one_color}

```C
Color color(uint8_t r, uint8_t g, uint8_t b)
```

Constructing a color
